sourcesContent:
<section>

    <form>
        <input type="text" placeholder="filter by city">
        <button class="primary" type="button">search</button>
    </form>
    //diretiva ngFor
    <app-drink-list 
    *ngFor="let cardLocation of cardLocationList" 
    [cardLocation]="cardLocation">
    </app-drink-list>
    <app-footer></app-footer>

</section>
